document.full_text: counter-culture hero and 1960s protest singer bob dylan got a rapturous welcome from fans on wednesday at his first gig in china, despite agreeing to sing an approved set so as not to offend political sensitivities.
document.title: bob dylan gets rapturous reception at china concert
lines_and_colors: counter-culture hero and 1960s protest singer bob dylan got a rapturous welcome from fans on wednesday at his first gig in china, despite agreeing to sing an approved set so as not to offend political sensitivities.
